title: What happens if you didn't do placements or ranked for whole season?
body:
I was tied up personally and didn't want to start ranked, season is about to end, wondering what happens as a result of not playing ranked nor placements this season!?

Did I lose MMR, or is there any major impact?

replies.body: No impact whatsoever! If you happened to be ranked high enough, there might have been decay problems, but since you never ranked at all there are no downsides to that.
Sweet! I figured it might be the case, but wondered, thanks for the quick reply!

> [{quoted}](name=bluefyr3,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QdpbXbFE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-03T04:04:21.609+0000)
>
> Sweet! I figured it might be the case, but wondered, thanks for the quick reply!

Not that it's any of my business, but what do you mean tied up personally? As in bad stuff?
